campaigns.name: Blockchain Basics Campaign
campaigns.description: A campaign to help newcomers understand blockchain technology.

tasks.name: Watch Intro Video
tasks.description: Watch a 15-minute introduction to blockchain technology.
tasks.proof: Submit the quiz after watching the video.

tasks.name: Join Discord Community
tasks.description: Join our blockchain community on Discord and introduce yourself.
tasks.proof: Provide a screenshot of your introduction message in Discord.

campaigns.name: Smart Contract Mastery
campaigns.description: A campaign for developers to dive deeper into smart contract development.

tasks.name: Complete Solidity Tutorial
tasks.description: Complete the Solidity smart contract tutorial.
tasks.proof: Submit the GitHub repo link of your completed smart contract.

tasks.name: Deploy Contract to Testnet
tasks.description: Deploy your smart contract to the Ethereum testnet.

campaigns.name: Testing Campaign
campaigns.description: This is a test of campaigns
